name: Prison BreakDance
description:
Tomorrow, you will die. You and your inmates have been sentenced to death. As your last will, you asked for the GB3000, an enormous boombox that you always wanted. You escape your cell and rally the other prisoners to throw a last party.

A game made in 48h for the ENJAM 2019 "Party like there's no tomorrow".

The team : 

Laurent Bariet : Sound design - Soundcloud || Youtube
Samuel Busson : Programming
Giome Dartoen : Game design & Level design - itch.io
Rémi Moreaux : Graphic design & UI/UX- Portfolio
Chiara Rosmarino : Game design & Level design - itch.io
Thibaud Ligneul : Management
